content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE sapisu_0bp_cat_text (
	[EXTRACT_DATETIME] varchar(100),
	[EXTRACT_RUN_ID] bigint,
	[KEY1] varchar(100),
	[LANGU] varchar(100),
	[ODQ_CHANGEMODE] varchar(100),
	[ODQ_ENTITYCNTR] bigint,
	[TXTLG] varchar(100),
	[_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
	[year] varchar(100),
	[month] varchar(100),
	[day] varchar(100)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'sapisu/0bp_cat_text/delta/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM sapisu_0bp_cat_text
GO
